resources.string: If you want to use a favorite song in your device as an alarm ringtone. Then you need to authorize the application to be able to set the alarm music!
You still want to use the password:

You want to protect your phone in every public places or being in a good sleep , this app will help you a lot.It warns you when thiefs are coming and just your PIN code or fingerprint can help you to stop it. Let\'s appreciate what it brings for you !!!
